head.title: His New Favorites Are All Edible

hedline.hl1: His New Favorites Are All Edible

block.p: AMAR GOEL, President and founder of Chipshot.com

Webvan -- Amazon and E*Trade are still great, but I've found some new ones I like, as well. I'm trying to get my parents to use Webvan (www.webvan .com), which is a great online grocery store, with over 33,000 items to choose from. You can also schedule a delivery time so you don't miss them.
AMAR GOEL, President and founder of Chipshot.com

Webvan -- Amazon and E*Trade are still great, but I've found some new ones I like, as well. I'm trying to get my parents to use Webvan (www.webvan .com), which is a great online grocery store, with over 33,000 items to choose from. You can also schedule a delivery time so you don't miss them.

Nirvana Chocolates -- I also like Nirvana Chocolates (www. nirvanachocolate.com). There, you can create your own box of chocolates. That way you don't have those two or three left over that no one will eat.
